name: Fiskesekretariatet
membership:
Baltic Sea Advisory Council
Deep Sea Conservation Coalition
goal:
The Fisheries Secretariat (FishSec) is a non-profit organisation working towards sustainable fisheries in Europe and worldwide. Our long-term goal is healthy seas with thriving fish stocks and great diversity.

At FishSec, we work towards more sustainable fisheries through information, international co-operation, capacity building and lobbying at an international level, with a focus on the Baltic Sea region and the European Union. We have a particular mission to support and help other organisations, as well as the public, with information and knowledge.
euInitiatives:
The implementation of the Common Fisheries Policy,
Baltic regional fisheries management, implementation of the landing obligation and related fisheries legislation, and implementation of the Marine Strategy Framework Directive.
